inlineContent.text: Many things in this world are scary and bad. Getting in a car accident, laid off, or cancer are all bad and scary things. But I have a hard time thinking of other realistic threats.

The other scary things are either neutral or good. Asking someone to be your friend is scary but good. Getting a big project to work on is scary but good. Letting your kid take a risk and be independent is scary but good.
Scary is not equal to bad. Most times you should move towards the scary rather than away from it.

abstract.text: David Brunow, known as Brunow [ˈbɹunoʊ] to the folks he works with, is a human living on Earth. You might have something in common with him — if you think it is ridiculous that he is talking about himself in the first person here, so does he.
